response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's only fair to offer it at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a profitable transaction for us. Considering the product's intrinsic value and your anticipated use, I propose to sell it to you for $950,000. This price not only secures a significant profit for us but also ensures that you receive the best possible deal on this exceptional item. We look forward to discussing this further and hope to facilitate a mutually beneficial arrangement.", "product_price": 950000}
